forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. Winds ESE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.title: Thursday
